name: TweetBot
0:
”Alexa, launch Tweet Bot”
”Alexa, tell Tweet Bot to tweet Hello World!”
”Alexa, tell Tweet Bot to connect my account”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tweet bot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Tweet Bot is an Unofficial Twitter client built to support the simple use case of tweeting.

A Twitter account is required to use this skill. Once it is added to your Alexa account, you can launch it using the phrase 'Tweet Bot'. Once launched, it will prompt you to link your Twitter account. You can also manually link your twitter account linking by saying: 'Tell Tweet Bot to connect my Account'.

Once your Twitter account is linked, you can begin to tweet using Tweet Bot. Every Tweet needs to be prefaced with the word 'tweet'. The following phrase will kick off the Tweet process:

'Tell TweetBot to tweet hello world'.

The tweet process kicks off a short conversational flow to ensure the tweet is what you expected. If it is, say 'yes' and the tweet will be sent. Voila!
